name: Platformer Island 2
description: Welcome to the latest Platformer Island game yet! Blast through the enemies that want to eat, bury, stomp, and even fart on you (why farting?) Use arrow keys or WASD to control Scratchy on his adventures to conquer Platformer Island! With the all-new Multiplayer mode, you can open up to 8 tabs, each with its own person playing Platformer Island 2!
